name: Shinseiki Odysselya
description: Shinseiki Odysselya (神聖紀オデッセリア) is a role-playing video game released by Vic Tokai in Japan for the Super Famicom in 1993. An American version was scheduled in 1994 titled Lost Mission, but was canceled. A quick review of the game was published in Vol. 58 of Nintendo Power with a scheduled release date of March 1994, which criticized the game for its "poor story translation" and "standard RPG play."
